name: Cards About Toronto
white_cards: A drunk girl getting banged on a pile of garbage bags
A kickstarter campaign to pay your rent
A loud fart that you thought would be a quiet fart
a purse stashed with condoms and dental dams
A thirteen minute make-out session with Kathleen Wynne
An Ossington hipster who really lives in Oakville
Being forced to compliment an ugly baby
Being the next contestant on the Cash Cab
Being the only high person at the party
Buying discount hoop earrings in Scarborough
Calling the Rogers Centre the Skydome
Celine Dion keeping her baby warm in the microwave
Chocolate covered Plan B morning after pills
Cross-dressing dads coming out to their adult children
Death by a tsunami of used condoms
Falling asleep on the bus and waking up in Islingtontown
Grandparents constantly asking why I'm single
Harry Potter male pregnancy fan fiction
Ignoring the elephant in the room
Intercourse with a hollowed out watermelon
King's Crown Nachos at Sneaky Dee's
Making really bad "Don Valley Parking-Lot" jokes
Not giving a shit about peanut allergies
Not going north of Bloor Street
Olivia Chow falling down an escalator, forever
Parking in a disabled space without a permit
Pass the gravy I got a double abortion
People who live on Toronto Island
Pretending the Distillery District is as cool as Montreal
Pretending to not shop at Walmart
Purchasing something you don't need to use a restroom
Raccoon: The other, other dark meat
Saying "Nuit Blanche was better last year"
Snorting coke off the back of a toilet
So You Think You Can Dance Canada
Spraying oneself with Febreeze in lieu of a shower
Standing on the left side of the escalator
Standing too close to someone at the urinal
Steven & Chris both blindfolded in a leather sling
Strippers who work the day shift
Taking Jack Layton's name in vain
Taking out payday loans to pay off other payday loans
That smell in the NE corner of High Park
That woman on the GO train that clears her throat every five seconds
The animatronic bears playing musical instruments at Chuck E. Cheese
The biggest booty shakin' float at Caribana
The sound of Adam Vaughan giving birth to a child
Those old people who live in the Manulife Centre
Tim Horton's Rrroll Up The Rim To Win Contest
Trolling the comment section on The Toronto Star
Truly believing Electric Circus was cool
Waving to someone who doesn't see you
When someone doesn't say "bleess you" after you sneeze

black_cards.text: _____ will always get you laid in Toronto
_____? There's an app for that!
After a night of drinking, I found _____ in my back pocket
Before deciding on the EdgeWalk, the CN Tower is considered _____ as a new attraction
Captain John's Seafood Restaurant really closed because of _____
Cash strapped City Hall has decided to implement a tax on _____ immediately
Come to Toronto for the _____, stay for the _____
HGTV presents its newest home improvement series titled _____
I blamed the streetcar but I was really late because of _____
I don't have enough money to eat this month because I spent my last ten bucks on _____
I forgot to vote because I was too distracted with _____
I have enough _____ to eat at home
I never met a _____ I didn't like
I picked up _____ on the night bus
If you miss the last boat back to the mainland from Toronto Island, prepare for a long night of _____
In Toronto, the phrase "Going to City Hall" is actually slang for _____
Margaret Atwood's next book is a thriller titled _____
My contribution to the potluck was _____
My family would be shocked to hear about _____ in my eulogy
New Canadians are not being forced to pledge their allegiance to _____
One in then TTC late night drivers will accept _____ in lieu of the proper fare
Play three, make a poem
The last time I went to Honest Ed's I walked out with _____
The Mayor was really smoking _____ in that video
The most used app on my cell phone is for _____
The newest bar in the Junction features _____ on the menu
The only thing to fear is _____
The worst birthday gift I ever received was _____
The worst blind date I ever went on invovled _____ and ended with _____
The worst thing in my Google search history is _____
This best describes my night each time the power fails in Toronto.
To improve customer safety, the TTC will be banning _____ from all trains
Today on Bodybreak, Hal Johnson and Joanne Mcleod introduce a new workout routine called _____
Toronto City Council has voted to cancel the Scarborough subway to better fund _____
What do you get the person who has everything?
What does everyone playing this game has in common?
What inspired my mother to choose my first name?
What ruined the Santa Claus Day parade this year?
What you do not want to see when the subway doors open?
Yorkville's latest fad diet is called _____
